markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 2" pfs="Standard">
[Perfect Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=542)
<actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 83 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

**Trigger** You miss a Strike with an unarmed attack.

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You call upon insight from your training to recover accuracy. Reroll the missed attack roll and keep the new result.
name: Perfect Strike
